entry.title: MINT JULEP Sarong
entry.summary:
Vendor: Screen printers' enterprise
Type: Sarongs
Price: 11.00

Size 40"x70"
100% cotton
Hand screen printed
Low-impact dyes
Machine wash cold, delicate cycle. Tumble dry low
Crafted by rural artisans from northwest India

Description

This beautiful, hand-screen printed sarong is made of 100% cotton and will keep you comfortable and looking cool. A must-have for a pool party or your beach vacay! Use as a wrap around skirt, a wrap around dress, a shawl or scarf.

A Fair Trade product. Handmade by artisans in India. 

How It's Made

Artisans use low-impact dyes to screen-print. The fabric is first set up on a frame and a stencil of the design is positioned on the fabric to spread dye or ink. The process has to be repeated for different colors and the dye has to be allowed to dry completely before using a dye of a different color. Artisans have to be knowledgeable of the dyes and the fabric and how they work with each other.
